import react from "react"; import "./donor.css" import CoWithYou from "./CoWithYou Logo.png" const Donor=()=>{ const [pro,setProduct]=useState({ Pname:null, PMD:null, PED:null, Contact:null, PDescription:null }) let name,value const handleInputs=(e)=>{ name=e.target.name; value=e.target.value if(!name||!value) window.alert("ERROR") else setProduct({...user,[name]:value}) } return( <>
Namsthey SAVES your life... Shake hand SHAKES your life...
Upload product details on CoWithYou
PNAME:-
EMAIL:-
PHONE:-
PASSWORD
CONFIRM PASSWORD
Login
) } export default Donor
